item.title: Indonesia
item.description: My next big trip will be to Indonesia, where I will go with my girlfriend (you will be able to follow the trip in our blog. It will be the farthest Iâ€™ve ever been from my home country - Spain. Going far away is a big factor on making a trip memorable. This will be some 12,000 km away. Indonesia is very different to any other country I have been to, some firsts will happen there .
